name: Shady Memory
description:
Do you enjoy quick, casual games that test your memory and reflexes? Shady Memory may be just the game for you! Use your limited number of light pulses in the dark to discover where the blocks are hidden... and then tap them out of existence before your timer hits zero! It's that simple! 

Shady Memory is a simple, casual game that almost anyone can pick up and play. It's a great game to play while standing in line, waiting for someone, or just to kill a few moments here and there.

* Click to pulse your limited lights.
* Train your memory and touch reflexes.
* Simple and casual game.
* Quick game play.

If you don't want to download, you can play this game for free here:

Shady Memory HTML5
